data.title: Maxim Releases Free White Paper

data.text:
Maxim, an industry leader in heat recovery evaporators, has released a free white paper on Offshore Technology.

In this white paper you can find information on the technological, operational, and financial investment that comes with the purchase of a fresh water maker. As operating efficiencies become increasingly critical and as companies become more environmentally conscious, Maxim Watermakers has the technology to meet those expectations.

Benefits of Maxim evaporators include:

Excellent return-on-investment

Compact design

Low cost operation

Safer to use

Low pressure system

Efficient operation

No feed filtration

Thermal circulation shroud
